scripts.copyJS: cp src/popup.js dist/ && cp src/options.js dist/ && cp src/background.js dist/ && cp src/deepfake.js dist/
scripts.copy: npm run copyManifest && npm run copyJS && npm run copyHTML && npm run copyImages && npm run copyCSS
scripts.build:parcel: parcel build src/*.html src/*.js --public-url ./ && npm run copyManifest && npm run copyImages && npm run copyCSS
